text: Tyahuna motha atyacari kona ahe jyane allahavara asatya racale kinva tyacya ayatinna khote tharavile, yanna granthapasuna tharalela his'sa pohocela, yetheparyanta ki jevha tyancyajavala amace phariste, tyance prana kadhanyasathi yetila, tevha mhanatila ki te kothe aheta, jyanna tumhi allahakherija pukarata rahile? Te mhanatila, amacyapasuna haravaleta ani svatah kaphira (adharmi) asanyace svatahca kabula karatila
